release_notes.en-US:
Thunderbird 60 compatibility!  Thanks for your patience in adapting to the latest in Thunderbird releases.  Nothing else has functionally changed in the add-on itself.

Special thanks to Manuel Rüger for making a pull request.

release_notes.en-US: Version 1.1 is not backwards compatible due to changes between Thunderbird 2 and Thunderbird 3.  The functionality remains the same, with the addition of a few new localizations.  Users of Thunderbird 2 should continue to use ConfirmFolderMove version 1.0.

With no bug reports since release, I'm happy to up the version number to 1.0.  There are no functional changes to this version; however, with Thunderbird 2.0's release, the specific file this add-on overrides was changed, so this version is incompatible with prior versions of Thunderbird.  Use 0.3 for those earlier versions.
New preference to entirely disable dialogs, never moving folders, added German localization - thanks to Dennis Pl
Already compatible with latest Thunderbird update, changing application version range to match.
